search_input: And now I long for you in the night
suggested_query: I long for the way we used to walk hand in hand, under the streetlights, with the sound of the river in the distance. The world seemed to slow down then, and all that mattered was the two of us, lost in our own little world. And now, I'm left with only memories, and the ache of longing for what could never be again.
suggest_context: MEES The rose is a rose. And was always a rose. But the theory now goes That the apple's a rose, And the pear is, and so's The plum, I suppose. The dear only knows What will next prove a rose. You of course, are a rose - But were always a rose. The night has been ours Since we first watched a film It has always been so You now said there was a tension for a long time And I have to agree. Although I didn't dare to admit. And now I long for you in the night
